summary:
I've been blogging for about 20 years (except for a couple of years off).  I love it.  There are several reasons why I like blogging:
WritingThere's something wonderful about seeing sentences grow, letter by letter, on a blank page...
title: The beauty of blogging

summary: A supportive message to a fellow blogger about the importance of community and the impact of writing, even when the response seems small
title: Re: Equally different
